meanings.definition: The explicit or vivid depiction of something, often disturbing or violent.
meanings.sent1: The movie's graphicness left a lasting impression on the audience.
meanings.sent2: The graphicness of the crime scene shocked the investigators.
meanings.sent3: The graphicness of the horror movie made everyone jump in their seats.
